title: Ep 20: All the Hair Feels
itunes:title: Ep 20: All the Hair Feels
itunes:subtitle: Beauty news bonanza! We discuss L'Oreal Beaumojis, Barnes & Noble's new beauty selection, and predict the future of BeautyCon. Plus, we rate our favorite skincare devices. Finally, hairstylist Jon Reyman explains why dry cutting is superi...
description:
Beauty news bonanza! We discuss L'Oreal Beaumojis, Barnes & Noble's new beauty selection, and predict the future of BeautyCon. Plus, we rate our favorite skincare devices. Finally, hairstylist Jon Reyman explains why dry cutting is superior, and the real reason some women seek out dude hairstylists.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
